parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 50.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description: The type of the task. For more information about task types, see the descriptions in the "DescribeDownloadTaskType" topic. If you do not specify this parameter, all files are queried by default.
